mapper.select: SELECT q.QST_SEQ, q.QST_ID , q.QST_TITLE, q.QST_CONTENT, q.QST_SPECIES, q.QST_PART, q.QST_REGDATE, q.QST_FAST FROM QUESTBOARD q JOIN USERSINFO u ON q.QST_ID = u.USERS_ID WHERE (q.QST_STATUS = 'Y' OR q.QST_STATUS = 'R') ORDER BY q.QST_REGDATE DESC

SELECT q.QST_SEQ, u.USERS_NAME , q.QST_TITLE, q.QST_CONTENT, q.QST_SPECIES, q.QST_PART, q.QST_REGDATE, q.QST_FAST FROM QUESTBOARD q, USERSINFO u, ANIMALCODE a, ANIMALPART a2 WHERE q.QST_ID = u.USERS_ID AND q.QST_SPECIES = a.ANM_CODE AND q.QST_PART = a2.PART_CODE AND (q.QST_STATUS = 'Y' OR q.QST_STATUS = 'R') AND q.QST_SPECIES = #{qst_species} ORDER BY q.QST_REGDATE DESC

SELECT q.QST_SEQ, u.USERS_NAME , q.QST_TITLE, q.QST_CONTENT, a.ANM_SPECIES, a2.PART_NAME, q.QST_REGDATE, q.QST_FAST FROM QUESTBOARD q, USERSINFO u, ANIMALCODE a, ANIMALPART a2 WHERE q.QST_ID = u.USERS_ID AND q.QST_SPECIES = a.ANM_CODE AND q.QST_PART = a2.PART_CODE AND (q.QST_STATUS = 'Y' OR q.QST_STATUS = 'R') AND q.QST_SPECIES = #{qst_species} AND q.QST_PART = #{qst_part} ORDER BY q.QST_REGDATE DESC

SELECT q.QST_SEQ, u.USERS_NAME , q.QST_ID, q.QST_TITLE, q.QST_CONTENT, q.QST_REGDATE, q.QST_FAST, r.RPY_SEQ, r.RPY_ID , r.RPY_REF , r.RPY_CONTENT , r.RPY_STATUS, r.RPY_CHOSEN FROM QUESTBOARD q ,USERSINFO u, REPLYBOARD r WHERE q.QST_SEQ = r.RPY_REF AND q.QST_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY q.QST_SEQ

SELECT u.USERS_NAME , q.QST_ID, q.QST_TITLE, q.QST_CONTENT, q.QST_REGDATE, r.RPY_ID , r.RPY_REF , r.RPY_CONTENT , r.RPY_STATUS FROM QUESTBOARD q ,USERSINFO u, REPLYBOARD r WHERE q.QST_ID = u.USERS_ID AND q.QST_SEQ = r.RPY_REF AND (q.QST_STATUS = 'Y' OR r.RPY_STATUS = 'Y') AND q.QST_SEQ = #{qst_seq} ORDER BY r.RPY_SEQ DESC

SELECT q.QST_ID, u.USERS_NAME , q.QST_TITLE, q.QST_CONTENT, q.QST_SPECIES, q.QST_PART, q.QST_REGDATE, q.QST_STATUS, r.RPY_SEQ, r.RPY_ID , RPY_CONTENT , r.RPY_REGDATE, r.RPY_STATUS FROM QUESTBOARD q, USERSINFO u, REPLYBOARD r WHERE q.QST_ID = u.USERS_ID AND q.QST_SEQ = RPY_REF AND q.QST_STATUS = 'R' OR r.RPY_STATUS ='R'

SELECT CONCAT('Q', NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(QST_SEQ,2))), 0)+1) AS QST_SEQ FROM QUESTBOARD
INSERT INTO QUESTBOARD (QST_SEQ, QST_ID, QST_TITLE, QST_CONTENT, QST_SPECIES, QST_PART, QST_REGDATE, QST_FAST, QST_STATUS) VALUES( #{qst_seq}, #{qst_id}, #{qst_title}, #{qst_content}, #{qst_species}, #{qst_part}, SYSDATE , 'N' , 'Y' )

(SELECT CONCAT('R',NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(RPY_SEQ,2))), 0)+1) AS RPY_SEQ FROM REPLYBOARD)
INSERT INTO REPLYBOARD (RPY_SEQ, RPY_ID, RPY_REF, RPY_CONTENT, RPY_REGDATE, RPY_STATUS, RPY_CHOSEN) VALUES( #{rpy_id}, rpy_ref, #{rpy_content}, SYSDATE, 'Y' , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(r.RPY_SEQ) FROM HOSPITAL h JOIN REPLYBOARD r ON h.HOSP_ID = r.RPY_ID WHERE r.RPY_STATUS = 'Y' AND h.HOSP_ID = #{hosp_id}
SELECT COUNT(r.RPY_SEQ) FROM HOSPITAL h JOIN REPLYBOARD r ON h.HOSP_ID = r.RPY_ID WHERE r.RPY_CHOSEN = 'Y' AND h.HOSP_ID = #{hosp_id}

SELECT h.HOSP_ID, COUNT(r.RPY_SEQ) AS 전체_작성_글_수, SUM(CASE WHEN r.RPY_CHOSEN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 채택된_글_수, (SUM(CASE WHEN r.RPY_CHOSEN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(r.RPY_SEQ)) * 100 AS 채택율 FROM HOSPITAL h JOIN REPLYBOARD r ON h.HOSP_ID = r.RPY_ID WHERE r.RPY_STATUS = 'Y' AND h.HOSP_ID = #{hosp_id} GROUP BY h.HOSP_ID
